Sentencas: High ionic conductivity of doped ceria at comparatively lower operating temperatures (similar to 650 degrees C) makes it suitable solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrolyte.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline Gd doped ceria by combustion technique

Sentencas: In the present investigation, successful attempt has been made to synthesize Ce(0.9)Gd(0.1)O(1.95) (GDC10) solid solution by cost effective and simple chemical method of combustion where in the combustion of precursors results in the formation of nanoparticles relatively at lower processing temperature.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline Gd doped ceria by combustion technique

Sentencas: The thermogravimetric study was carried out to understand the ignition temperature and optimize the fuel-to-oxidant ratio.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline Gd doped ceria by combustion technique

Sentencas: The successful synthesis of single phase nanocrystalline GDC10 was confirmed by XRD, TEM and particle size analysis.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline Gd doped ceria by combustion technique

Sentencas: Further SEM and surface measurements were carried out to confirm higher sample densities.
Titulo: Synthesis of nanocrystalline Gd doped ceria by combustion technique
